data.title: Location of Sana'a in Yemen Map
data.meta_description: Where is Sana'a located? Sana'a is the capital city of Yemen, find here Sana'a location on Yemen map along with know interesting facts about the city.
data.text:
71

Sana’a is located in the western part of Yemen, in the Arabian Peninsula. It is the capital and largest city of Yemen, situated in the Yemeni Highlands. The city’s Old City has been designated a UNESCO World Heritage site, showcasing its historical significance and architectural treasures. Sana’a’s location in the heart of Yemen adds to its allure as a city where time seems to stand still, offering a glimpse into the country’s rich past.
